org.eclipse.papyrus.designer.languages.common.extensionpoints

Interface ILangProjectSupport


  • public interface ILangProjectSupport
    Common interface to create projects for a specific programming language.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.eclipse.core.resources.IProject createProject(String projectName)
      Create a project for a specific language and configure it (according to gathered configuration data before).
      org.eclipse.core.resources.IProject createProject(String projectName, org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Package modelRoot)
      Create a project for a specific language and configure it (according to gathered configuration data before).

      Gather configuration data from implementations, e.g.

    • Method Detail

      • createProject

        org.eclipse.core.resources.IProject createProject(String projectName)
        Create a project for a specific language and configure it (according to gathered configuration data before). In case of C/C++ for instance, a CDT project should be created, in case of Java, a JDT project. An implementation should call setProject and setSettings before returning the project
        Parameters:
        projectName - the named of the project
        Returns:
        the created project

      • createProject

        org.eclipse.core.resources.IProject createProject(String projectName,
                                                  org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Package modelRoot)
        Create a project for a specific language and configure it (according to gathered configuration data before). In case of C/C++ for instance, a CDT project should be created, in case of Java, a JDT project. An implementation should call setProject and setSettings before returning the project. It also adds the Maven nature to the project when the user wants a Maven project to be generated.
        Parameters:
        projectName - the named of the project
        modelRoot - the root package of the model used to generate the project
        Returns:
        the created project

      • setSettings

        void setSettings(org.eclipse.core.resources.IProject project,
                 AbstractSettings settings)
        Write the project settings from the passed project specific settings. (which may be obtained via gatherConfigData).
        Parameters:
        the - operating system for which code should be produced

      • initialConfigurationData

        AbstractSettings initialConfigurationData()
        Create an initial (empty) configuration.
        Returns:
        the project specific configuration.

      • gatherConfigData

        void gatherConfigData(org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Classifier implementation,
                      AbstractSettings settings)
        Gather configuration data from implementations, e.g. required include paths or libraries. It will enrich the project specific settings.
        Parameters:
        implementation - a class copied to the target
